name: small brazier
description: It is a small metal bowl that can be used to burn fire inside the camp. The fire that burns in the brazier does not ignite the surrounding combustibles. Unlike a large brazier, it can not be used as a cooking tool.

name: waterproof rag
description: It is a large waterproofed fabric. There is no blade protection, so it can not be treated as a tarpaulin for disassembly.
